thread.section_title: Ibis Paris Montmartre 18eme - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awful value for money
thread.title_full: Awful value for money - Review of Ibis Paris Montmartre 18eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mai V
title: Awful value for money
text: We booked the double standard room but it was awfully small. Necessities like boiling kettle, fridge or even tissue paper is a luxury because we weren't offered any to our surprise. We enquired with the hotel and they said they will not provide it. For the price that we paid and for the type of room we booked, this is not acceptable.
